item.name: WLC Max Number Of APs Supported

item_prototype.name: $1 Ap If No Of Users 2.4 GHz
item_prototype.description: No of Users associated with this radio.

item_prototype.name: $1 Ap If No Of Users 5 GHz
item_prototype.description: No of Users associated with this radio.

item_prototype.name: $1 AP If Phy Channel Number 2.4 GHz
item_prototype.description: Current channel number of the AP Interface. Channel numbers will be from 1 to 14 for 802.11b interface type. Channel numbers will be from 34 to 169 for 802.11a interface type.

item_prototype.name: $1 AP If Phy Channel Number 5 GHz
item_prototype.description: Current channel number of the AP Interface. Channel numbers will be from 1 to 14 for 802.11b interface type. Channel numbers will be from 34 to 169 for 802.11a interface type.

discovery_rule.name: WLC Clients data
discovery_rule.description: 802.11 MAC Address of the Mobile Station.

item_prototype.name: $1 - Client Ip Address
item_prototype.description: IP Address of the Mobile Station

item_prototype.name: $1 - Client RSSI
item_prototype.description: Average packet RSSI for the Mobile Station.

discovery_rule.name: WLC Interfaces data
discovery_rule.description:
You may also consider using IF-MIB::ifType or IF-MIB::ifAlias for discovery depending on your filtering needs.
{$SNMP_COMMUNITY} is a global macro.

item_prototype.name: Admin status of interface {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The desired state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Inbound errors on interface {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol.

item_prototype.name: Incoming traffic on interface {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The number of octets in valid MAC frames received on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

item_prototype.name: Operational status of interface {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface.

item_prototype.name: Outbound errors on interface {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that could not be transmitted because of errors. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that could not be transmitted because of errors.

item_prototype.name: Outgoing traffic on interface {#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The number of octets transmitted in MAC frames on this interface, including the MAC header and FCS.

trigger_prototype.name: Operational status was changed on {HOST.NAME} interface {#SNMPVALUE}

item_prototype.name: $1 - No Of Users Currently Associated
item_prototype.description: "No of Mobile Stations currently associated with the WLAN."
